editGroup(int, String, String, int) - Static method in class autoChirp.DBConnector
updates a groups description or title in the database (if userID fits to groupID)
editGroup(int) - Method in class autoChirp.webController.GroupController
A HTTP GET request handler, responsible for serving /groups/edit/$groupid.
editGroupPost(int, String, String) - Method in class autoChirp.webController.GroupController
A HTTP POST request handler, responsible for serving /groups/edit/$groupid.
editTweet(int, String, int, String, float, float) - Static method in class autoChirp.DBConnector
updates the content, imageUrl and/or geo-location of a single tweet (if userID fits to tweetID)
editTweet(int) - Method in class autoChirp.webController.TweetController
A HTTP GET request handler, responsible for serving /tweets/edit/$tweetid.
editTweetPost(int, String, String, float, float) - Method in class autoChirp.webController.TweetController
